summary: Despite facing numerous challenges and setbacks, continuous effort and determination led to eventual success in the negotiations."
The ability to adjust strategies and counteroffers in response to changing demands was crucial in reaching a successful compromise."

keyphrase: The Role of Stress in Achievement
summary: Enduring stress and pressure throughout the negotiation process ultimately contributed to a rewarding sense of accomplishment."
Working together as a team, sharing ideas, and supporting each other were essential in overcoming obstacles and achieving a favorable outcome."
